item.title: RT by @ellenallien: BPitch is thrilled to welcome #galaxian on our agency roster 🙌🏻 Galaxian has made a crucial contribution to modern electronic music at once de-constructing and turning it on it’s head while making bold strides into unexplored territories. Requests through: booking@bpitch.de
item.dc:creator: @BPitchControl
item.description:
BPitch is thrilled to welcome #galaxian on our agency roster 🙌🏻
Galaxian has made a crucial contribution to modern electronic music at once de-constructing and turning it on it’s head while making bold strides into unexplored territories.
Requests through:
booking@bpitch.de

item.title: I loved playing at the outstanding #voltage festival in 2021 so much 🪐 here is my podcast to beam us there 🎵ufo techno 🎶 with unreleased tracks from #djeuroparking myself 👽 🔗 https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/tABPTj199vS3hEei6

item.title: WeAreNotAlone VA Compilation pt. 4 is digitally out today! 🛸🛸 featuring reka, sdbx, @francoisxox wallis @AFUlimited, crystal geometry, matasism @__ASEC Uncrat @Karl_kave @dollkraut 🖤🖤 and my track 'Reality' 👽 Listen/purchase: http://wearenotalone.lnk.to/pt4 physical in September
item.dc:creator: @ellenallien
item.description:
WeAreNotAlone VA Compilation pt. 4 is digitally out today! 🛸🛸 featuring reka, sdbx, @francoisxox wallis @AFUlimited, crystal geometry, matasism @__ASEC Uncrat @Karl_kave @dollkraut 🖤🖤 and my track 'Reality' 👽

item.dc:creator: @BPitchControl
item.description:
Happy Release Day!!!
@dillonzky single, “<3core” is out today 💗 an insight into her fourth album, ’’6abotage’’ 🎵 Written and produced with @alexistroyprod ,Dillon describes the album as “a love letter, a cry for help and a consequence all in one 🎵🎵
dillon.lnk.to/6abotage
